docs.lead_paragraph: When two prestigious medical and scientific groups condemned marijuana as a "dangerous drug" last week, they rekindled an issue that has been smoldering since "pot" began to make inroads on alcohol as the escape valve of the middle class.
docs.snippet: When two prestigious medical and scientific groups condemned marijuana as a "dangerous drug" last week, they rekindled an issue that has been smoldering since "pot" began to make inroads on alcohol as the escape valve of the middle class.
